defaultPosition.description: Assigned to various locations for various periods of active duty to provide staff judge advocate services to smaller commands; performed legal assistance duties; provided advocacy for wounded military service members appearing before the formal board for the Navy's Disability Evaluation System.  Retired after 31 years.
defaultPosition.title: Judge Advocate General's Corps, Staff Judge Advocate
